sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"干涉，干预"之意。
means: interfere ： 侧重指无权或未获允许而妨碍、阻扰、干涉他人之事。
intervene ： 书面用词，指介入争端，进行调停，也指干涉他人之事。
meddle ： 指干预与自己毫不相关的事或不属于自己职责范围的事，隐含未经许可或授权。可与interfere换用。

sentence.Network_en: The Government is doing nothing to intervene in the crisis.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府没有采取任何行动对这次危机进行干预。

sentence.Network_en: The security forces had to intervene to prevent the situation worsening.
sentence.Network_cn: 安全部队不得不介入，以防止局势进一步恶化。

sentence.Network_en: He would ask Congress to intervene and head off a strike.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将要求国会进行干预，防止发生罢工。

超全的英语短句汇集 - ξσ Dicky σξ - 博客园 ... interpret v. 解释 intervene vi 插入，干涉 introduce vt. 引进，引导.

list.abs: intervening amplifier 介入放大器intervening cable 介入电缆interwoven silk 交织绸
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... intervening mechanism 中介机制 intervening variable 中介变量 intervention 干预.
中介变项(Intervening Variable): 介于自变项与依变项之间的一切对实验结果发生作用的内在历程,而且不能由直接观察办认. 例如 X->Z->Y
干扰变量(Intervening Variables)：属于研究中可以判断其存在，但是无法控制或测量的变量，也有的叫中间变量、无关变量，或复合 …
intervening film 插入膜intervening well 插入井intervention 调停

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'come in as an extraneous factor or thing'): from Latin intervenire, from inter- 'between' + venire 'come'

entry.def: If you intervene in a situation, you become involved in it and try to change it.

example.ex: The situation calmed down when police intervened...
example.tran: 警方干预后，局势平息下来。

example.ex: The Government is doing nothing to intervene in the crisis.
example.tran: 政府没有采取任何行动对这次危机进行干预。

entry.def: If you intervene, you interrupt a conversation in order to add something to it.

example.ex: Hattie intervened and told me to stop it...
example.tran: 哈蒂打断我，叫我停下来。

example.ex: 'I've told you he's not here,' Irena intervened.
example.tran: “我告诉你了他不在这里,”伊雷娜插话说。

entry.def: If an event intervenes, it happens suddenly in a way that stops, delays, or prevents something from happening.

example.ex: The South African mailboat arrived on Friday mornings unless bad weather intervened...
example.tran: 除非受恶劣天气干扰,南非邮船一般在星期五上午抵达。

example.ex: I pray that death may not intervene to prevent our meeting with my darling children.
example.tran: 我祈祷死亡不要阻挠我们与我亲爱的孩子们见一面。

means.word_mean: 1. get involved, so as to alter or hinder an action, or through force or threat of force;

sentences.sentence: "Why did the U.S. not intervene earlier in WW II?"

means.word_mean: 2. be placed or located between other things or extend between spaces and events;

sentences.sentence: "This interludes intervenes between the two movements"

means.word_mean: 3. occur between other event or between certain points of time;

sentences.sentence: "the war intervened between the birth of her two children"

auth_sentence.content: When they really need us, we will intervene.
auth_sentence.res_content: When they really need us, we will intervene.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When they really need us, we will intervene.

auth_sentence.content: Libyan troops intervene in civil war in northern Chad.
auth_sentence.res_content: Libyan troops intervene in civil war in northern Chad.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Libyan troops intervene in civil war in northern Chad.

auth_sentence.content: Then Justice would also decline to intervene in Newell.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then Justice would also decline to intervene in Newell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then Justice would also decline to intervene in Newell.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+veni=ven来,走+ent表形容词→全部能来,没有障碍的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 林荫路,大街;[比喻]途径,渠道,方法

con共同+veni=ven来,走+ence表名词→全部能来,没有障碍
co共同+ven来,走+ant→共同走来,协议

stems_affixes.value_cn: 详细目录,存货,财产清册,总量
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进+ven来,走+tory→进来的全部财产,清单
re回+ven来,走+ue→收回来
contra反+ven走+e→反着走→违反
con共同+ven来,走+e→来到一起,召集
co共同+ven来,走+ant→共同走来,协议
inter之间+ven走+e→走在二者之间→干涉

stems_affixes.value_cn: 盘存，盘点;编制详细目录
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进+ven来,走+tory→进来的全部财产,清单
inter在……之间,相互+changeable可改变的→adj.可互换的
inter在…之间+n+al表形容词→adj.内在的, 国内的
inter在……之间,相互+national国家的→adj.国际的
inter在……之间,相互+personal个人的→adj.人与人之间的
inter在……之间,相互+action行动→相互行动→影响
inter在……之间,相互+lud玩+e→在中间玩→活动间休息
inter在……之间,相互+relate关连→n.相互关连
inter在……之间,相互+v+al表形容词→n.间隔, 距离
inter在……之间,相互+pose放→放在二者之间
inter在……之间,相互+sect切割→在中间切→横断
inter在……之间,相互+sperse散开→v.散布,点缀
inter在……之间,相互+ven走+e→走在二者之间→干涉

Sentence.sentence: Given the rising investment in college education, parental concern is not surprising, but learning where and when to intervene (干预 ) will help students take more ownership of the outcomes of these increasingly costly educations.

sentences.en: The President intervened personally in the crisis.
sentences.cn: 总统亲自出面处理这场危机。

sentences.en: She might have been killed if the neighbours hadn't intervened.
sentences.cn: 要不是邻居介入，她可能会没命了。

means.word_mean: 插嘴; 打断(别人的话)

sentences.cn: “但是”，她插嘴说，“其他的怎么办？”

jushi.english: The old man had made many plans, but death intervened.
jushi.chinese: 老人订出了许多计划,但他的去世中断了这些计划。

jushi.english: Parliament intervened to put an end to the strike of the miners.
jushi.chinese: 国会出面调停以结束矿工们的罢工。

jushi.english: I shall leave on Sunday if nothing intervenes.
jushi.chinese: 如果没有别的事,我星期天动身。
